headline: Coterra Energy price target lowered to $33 from $37 at UBS
summary: UBS lowered the firm’s price target on Coterra Energy (CTRA) to $33 from $37 and keeps a Buy rating on the shares. The firm sees Energy viewed as a recession downside play, the analyst tells investors in a research note. UBS lowered its price target reflecting increased uncertainty around economic activity and commodity prices.
